pageContext.claim: “....We no longer pay Pakistan the $Billions because they would take our money and do nothing for us, Bin Laden being a prime example, Afghanistan being another. They were just one of many countries that take from the United States without giving anything in return. That’s ENDING!”
pageContext.analysis: It's well established that Pakistan did not know bin Laden was residing in that country. The United States traditionally gives aid without having expectations of a “return.” The theory is that aid to Pakistan and Afghanistan helps them become stable societies so they in turn do not produce terrorists.
